alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 09 at 4:54PM CDT until April 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BEAVER COUNTY... At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Knowles, or 14 miles northeast of Beaver, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Knowles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
